lead_paragraph: Would-be commercial drivers tapped into a network of cheaters who used secret codes to provide answers to test-takers in exam rooms.
snippet: Would-be commercial drivers tapped into a network of cheaters who used secret codes to provide answers to test-takers in exam rooms....
abstract: Prosecutors in Brooklyn and Manhattan charge 19 people in connection with scheme to help people who hoped for careers driving buses and trucks to cheat on commercial driver's license exam; organizers, who face up to 20 years in prison, provided answers and bribed security guards at several New York State Department of Motor Vehicles offices.

headline.main: 19 Are Charged in a Plot to Cheat on Commercial Driver’s License Tests
headline.print_headline: 19 Are Charged in a Plot to Cheat on Commercial Driver’s License Tests
